description: These fleece joggers are so irresistibly comfortable, you'll feel like you're living in them when you wear them for every road trip, work-from-home day, and daily errands around down. Crafted with our classic Trail Mix fleece's thermo-regulating, quick-dry ActiveTemp™ technology, these will keep you cool, dry, and comfortable. The next time the cold is creeping in on you, pull these on and kick back feeling fantastic.
name: Outdoor Research Trail Mix Joggers - Mens
